story:
Once upon a time, in a lush green forest in Thailand, there was a kind and gentle elephant named Phloi. Phloi was a young elephant, full of curiosity and energy. She loved to explore the forest and play with her friends.

One day, Phloi heard about a magical fruit that grew deep in the forest. This fruit was said to have the power to grant a single wish to whoever found it. Phloi was intrigued and decided to go on a journey to find this magical fruit.

The journey was long and difficult. Phloi had to cross raging rivers, climb steep mountains, and navigate through dense jungles. But she never gave up, determined to find the magical fruit and make her wish.

Finally, after many days of traveling, Phloi arrived at a beautiful clearing in the forest. And there, nestled in the branches of a large tree, was the magical fruit.

Phloi climbed the tree and carefully picked the fruit. She held it in her trunk and made her wish. She wished for the happiness and well-being of all her friends and family in the forest.

As soon as she made her wish, the magical fruit glowed brightly and then disappeared, leaving behind a shower of sparkling stars. Phloi felt a warm feeling in her heart and knew that her wish had been granted.

From that day on, Phloi's forest was the happiest place on earth. All the animals lived together in harmony, sharing food and playing together. And Phloi, with her kind and gentle heart, was always there to help and protect her friends and family.

And so, Phloi's journey to find the magical fruit taught her the power of kindness and love. And it brought happiness and joy to all the animals in the forest, forevermore.

Goodnight, my dear child. May you also have sweet dreams and always remember the power of kindness and love.
